actions.description: The deathlock makes two Deathly Claw or Grave Bolt attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Deathly Claw

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Grave Bolt

actions.description:
The deathlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: detect magic, disguise self, mage armor, mage hand

1/day each: dispel magic, hunger of Hadar, invisibility, spider climb
actions.name: Spellcasting

languages: the languages it knew in life
name: Deathlock [MoM]
resistances: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

specialTraits.description: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.
specialTraits.name: Turn Resistance

specialTraits.description: The deathlock doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
